Text: Thanks for the info. Now, why couldn't the original uploader just let us know that?

"Now, why couldn't the original uploader just let us know that?"

If you expand the files link, you will see that the torrent contains the file "Designing Interactions by Bill Moggridge.rar"

At that point, Google becomes your best friend:

http://lmgtfy/?q="Designing Interactions Bill Moggridge"
